<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep debug sections, unless explicitly requested to remove.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove everything else, including known sections.</span></CodeLine>
